channel.title: Recipes on Muhammed Uluyol
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Muhammed Uluyol

item.title: Neapolitan Pizza
item.description: Makes 6 pizzas using a cast-iron skillet. Tastes really good but the recipe is quite involved — you’ll need to use both your oven’s broil setting and the cooktop. Dough 4 cups flour 2 ¼ tsp salt 1 tsp instant yeast 2 tsp sugar 12 oz water Olive oil for working on the counter top (if you want, you can dust flour instead) Combine flour, salt, yeast, and sugar in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook attachment.

item.title: Basque Cheesecake
item.description: Easy and tasty dessert. Not too sweet and very light for a cheesecake. 1 ½ lbs cream cheese 1 ½ cups sugar 5 eggs ½ cups heavy cream ½ tsp salt 1 tsp vanilla extract Directions Let cold ingredients warm to room temperature, if possible. Pre-heat oven to 475°F convection with rack in the middle of the oven. Line a 7-inch cake pan with parchment paper, making sure that parchment fully covers all the sides of the pan.
